esenam demala jathika sandhanayataha jathyantharayata porondu wi balaya wimadhyagatha kirimakata yama janatha apekshawan itu kirimak nowe.eya athimahath bahuthara janathawage apekshawan nosalaka,wasara 2500 kata wada pawathi merata eekiyabhawaya nathikara rata winashaya kara gena yamaki.

maharagama ha kottawa nagarashrithawa pawathwagena yanu labana aapanashala saha thoga ha sillara welenda salwalin mahajanathawata wikunanu labana da pilibandawa soya balima kolambaa disthrik saukhya adhikari karyalaya magin sidu kerini.dehiwala, maharagama, piliyandala, moratuwa, homagama, kaduwela, kotte yana pradeshawala sewa niyuktha mahajana saukhya parikshakawaru wisi pahak pamana me meheyuma sandaha sahabhagi wuha.kal ikuth wu mila sandahan nowu saha nisi pramithiyakata nomathi aahara drawya hotalawala wikinimata thaba athi pisu aahara ha eewa gabada kara athi andamath, wata pita pirisudukama pilibandawath pariksha kalaha.dirapath wu umbalakada kilo gram hata pahak thoga welenda salaka thibi hamu wu athara eewa ee awasthawe dima winasha kala saukhya parikshakawaru mahajanathawage saukhyayata tharjanaya wana ayurin paribhogika bhanda nowikinimata upades dunha.nisi pramithiyata ha niyamitha bara nomathi aahara drawya wikinu welendasal ha hotala himiyanta dada niyama kala athara janathawata pidawak nowana ayurin thama paribhogika bhanda wikinimata pera soya balannayi da saukhya parikshakawaru adala welenda ha hotala himiyanta pawasuha..
